General.Name: Ningbo Homelink Eco-iTech Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Ningbo Homelink Eco-iTech Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of plastic daily necessities and biodegradable products in China and internationally. The company offers knives, chopsticks, forks, bowls, spoons, cups, plates, lids, straws, etc.; fully degradable film bags, etc.; disposable plastic products; plant fiber products, such as paper bowls, paper cups and straws, paper cutlery, and paper trays; injection products, such as cutlery, dishes, and household items; and blister products, as well as biodegradable modified materials. It serves supermarkets and catering giants. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.
